scripts.all: npm run install && npm run check && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run smart-clean && npm run dapp-clean && npm run wp-clean && npm run sub-clean
scripts.check: npm run smart-check && npm run dapp-check && npm run wp-check && npm run sub-check
scripts.build: npm run smart-build && npm run dapp-build && npm run wp-build && npm run sub-build
scripts.smart-clean: npx hardhat clean && rm -rf node_modules solidity/build && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.smart-check: npx prettier-eslint solidity/**/*.sol scripts/*js scripts/*.sh tests/*js --write
scripts.wp-build: PROD=true rollup -c && cd wordpress/kredeum-nfts && composer install --prefer-dist --no-progress
scripts.wp-check: npm run wp-fix && npm run wp-format
scripts.sub-check: npx prettier-eslint thegraph/**/*js thegraph/**/*.ts thegraph/**/*.json thegraph/**/*.yaml thegraph/**/*.graphql thegraph/**/*.md --write
scripts.sub-build: cd thegraph && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.sub-deploy: cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/matic-open-nft --ipfs https://api.subgraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.subgraph.com/deploy/
scripts.sub-deploy-mumbai: cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/mumbai-open-nft --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
